cast.name: 瓦尔德马·雅努茨扎克 Waldemar Januszczak

this_title: Borromini: The Dark Side of Baroque Season 1
trans_title: 博罗米尼：巴洛克的黑暗面 第一季
introduction: ...Of Baroque. Francesco Borromini, a true great of Baroque Rome, is known for his unparalleled genius, serving to revolutionise architecture forever. This documentary tells his story.
chinese_title: 博罗米尼：巴洛克的黑暗面 第一季
foreign_title: Borromini: The Dark Side of Baroque Season 1
